title: UDL-Based Mobile Microlearning for Inclusive Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Training course emphasizing the development of inclusive educational strategies for language education contexts, targeting in-service professionals

learning_goals: Design three or more inclusive learning activities by applying the UDL three principles (Representation, Action & Expression, Engagement) to language education material development
Propose two or more differentiated language teaching strategies considering learner diversity (language proficiency, cultural background, etc.)
Suggest three or more ways to enhance learning engagement using mobile-optimized microcontent (5 minutes or less)
Map the support levels (minimum/intermediate/advanced) required by inclusive education policies to the UDL framework and explain
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
